steps.title: Easily Remove Watermarks from {{FileformatCap}} Files in {{EnvName}}

content.title: **[{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}})** lets {{EnvName}} developers quickly clear watermarks from {{FileformatCap}} files. Here’s how you can do it:
content.step_1: Start by passing your {{FileformatCap}} file to the {{TextWatermarkerBold}} constructor. You can use a file path, byte stream, or file stream.
content.step_2: Use the {{TextSearchCriteriaBold}} object to search for watermarks you want to remove. Filter by image, text, or formatting for precise results.
content.step_3: After searching, you’ll get a list of watermarks. Select and remove the ones you don’t need.
content.step_4: When finished, save the document to a file or stream.

more_features.title: Powerful Watermark Removal with {{ProgLang}} in {{EnvName}} | {{ProdShortName}}
more_features.description: Take advantage of our {{ProgLang}} {{EnvName}} API to remove watermarks from PDFs and Office files. Get clean, professional documents ready for any use.

feature_1.title: Accurate Watermark Deletion in {{EnvName}}
feature_1.content: Our {{ProgLang}} API is built for precise watermark removal, so your files keep their original look and formatting. Great for business, legal, or academic documents.

feature_2.title: Batch Watermark Removal with {{ProgLang}}
feature_2.content: Speed up your workflow by removing watermarks from many files at once. Perfect for handling large document collections efficiently.

feature_3.title: Flexible Watermark Editing and Clearing
feature_3.content: Edit or remove watermarks as needed. The API gives you options to keep your documents looking just right for any requirement.

code_1.title: Remove background watermark from a presentation
code_1.content: This example shows how to delete a background image from a specific slide.
